assets.changelog:
###    🚀 新功能

- Legacy Fabric 支持  -  by @CiiLu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1118 [<samp>(63c19)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/63c19af1)
- **CompMod**: 接入 MCIM 文件下载镜像源  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(55fb4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/55fb4bf6)
- **CustomDownload**: 为自定义下载添加 User-Agent 支持#1041  -  by @BartcreeBart and @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1058 and https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1041 [<samp>(63806)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/63806424)
- **Download**: 更新未列版本镜像源地址  -  by @zkitefly and @8MiYile in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1137 [<samp>(4b4b4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/4b4b4676)
- **LifeCycle**: 加入更多的可观察日志  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(5b129)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5b129a2d)
- **PageOtherTest**: 允许下载 UNC 文件  -  by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1123 [<samp>(376ef)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/376efcfa)
- **PageVersion**: 添加.litematic详细信息中原始名称显示  -  by @caomei269 [<samp>(a3d4e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a3d4e862)
- **PageVersionCompResource**: 原理图管理相关优化  -  by @caomei269 [<samp>(9475c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9475cbbb)
- **Test**: 添加创建快捷方式按钮  -  by @ruattd and @wyc-26 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1132 [<samp>(2c0c2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/2c0c2370)
- **launch**: 支持切换使用 java.exe 而不是 javaw.exe 启动游戏  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1115 [<samp>(1e23c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1e23c36a)
- **link**: 大厅成员列表本机项目加了个 NAT 类型显示 feat: upd core  -  by @Pigeon0v0 [<samp>(d776e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d776e684)
- **log**: 添加导出日志页面  -  by @shimoranla [<samp>(9b6b6)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9b6b65fe)
- **update**: 使用核心库更新服务代替原文件替换过程  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(71e49)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/71e49fe1)

###    🐛 修复

- 主页市场滚动条偏左  -  by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1059 [<samp>(a70e2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a70e2040)
- 披风预览的一些问题  -  by @wyc-26 [<samp>(c7ba9)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c7ba9cd7)
- **CompMod**:
  - 存在同名的模组文件时搜索会发生崩溃  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(fb374)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/fb374f98)
- **JLW**:
  - 部分地方没有默认不使用 JLW  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(1dc14)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1dc1465a)
- **Link**:
  - 存在重复的刷新  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(8571b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/8571b586)
  - 大厅功能优化与修复  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1068 [<samp>(41588)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/41588d60)
  - 修复局域网广播可能找不到的问题  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1144 [<samp>(86717)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/867173e7)
- **Mod**:
  - 项目结构  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(786d3)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/786d30cf)
- **MsLogin**:
  - 尝试性修复正版验证第五步错误  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(07001)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/070014ea)
- **PageSetupLink**:
  - 龙猫的屎山代码 close #1127  -  by @wyc-26 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1127 [<samp>(16f2e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/16f2e4f6)
- **PageVersionCompResource**:
  - 优化文件夹操作提示和空状态显示  -  by @caomei269 [<samp>(a353c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a353c911)
- **Profile**:
  - 可能的导出导入失败  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(b9bd2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/b9bd223d)
  - 微软账户登录的一些小问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(bf8eb)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/bf8eb23b)
  - 修改玩家名输入名称界面点取消后仍然弹出警告  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(47f57)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/47f571a2)
- **UI**:
  - 点击导出页面的刷新按钮会跳转到修改页面  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(73ec0)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/73ec0bfe)
- **log**:
  - 修正工程文件  -  by @shimoranla [<samp>(ffeb1)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/ffeb113e)
  - 修复导出日志无法匹配 LastPending  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(6136f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6136fb19)
- **modpack**:
  - 可能会因为镜像源获取到的模组信息不够直接爆炸而不重试  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(1e58e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1e58e95b)

###    ⚡ 性能优化

- **MsLogin**: 优化 MsLoginStep1 阶段的代码  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(84e7b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/84e7b6fe)
- **Net**: 网络代码小优化  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(47e96)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/47e96850)
- **UI**: 版本 -> 实例 / version -> instance  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1141 [<samp>(1b03a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1b03a5d2)
- **link**: 去除 --smol-tcp 参数  -  by @Pigeon0v0 [<samp>(5f4cf)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5f4cfc0f)

###    🛠️ 改进

- **about**: 重新排列关于页面并添加社区版相关信息  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1119 [<samp>(e7c93)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e7c93987)
